sentences.english: Fear not therefore: ye are of more value than many sparrows.
sentences.chinese: 不要惧怕，你们比许多麻雀还贵重。

sentences.english: This is a very expensive tape-recorder.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个非常贵重的录音机。

sentences.english: To highlight the valuable porcelain and value, special permits issued this.
sentences.chinese: 为突出该瓷器的贵重与价值，特发此证。

sentences.english: And that would be the greatest gift I could offer.
sentences.chinese: 那将是我所能给予她们的最贵重的礼物。

sentences.english: Thick cotton padding embedded the precious vase in its box.
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的棉花填塞物紧紧围住装在盒子中的贵重花瓶。

sentences.english: High Back RTG usually commands a higher price than the Normal RTG.
sentences.chinese: 高背红尾金其价值通常比正常红尾金来的贵重些。

sentences.english: I would like to check me valuables。
sentences.chinese: 请将我的贵重物品寄存。

sentences.english: Is there anything valuables or frangible (breakable) in your luggage?
sentences.chinese: 请问行李里有贵重和易碎的物品吗？

sentences.english: Celery contains a valuable chemical substance that helps lower blood pressure. ;
sentences.chinese: 芹菜里含有一种贵重的能匡助低落血压的化学物质。

sentences.english: It wphrottoms a precious moment I didn't want to move.
sentences.chinese: 那一刻云云贵重以至于我没有念挪动转移半步。

sentences.english: Nearly every day, there are reports to the security office on campus that valuable things are stolen away.
sentences.chinese: 几乎每天校园里都有向保安处报告说贵重物品被偷。

sentences.english: Why were spices so highly valued in late 15th- century Europe?
sentences.chinese: 为什么香料在15世纪末期的欧洲如此贵重？

sentences.english: Yes , I have . Can Ideposit valuables here ?
sentences.chinese: 有，我可以将贵重物品寄存在这里吗？

sentences.english: Of the two, time is the most valuable, for it cannot be replenished.
sentences.chinese: 而其中时间更加贵重，因为时间是不能重来的。

sentences.english: Is there anything valuable or breakable in your bag?
sentences.chinese: 你的袋子里面有比较贵重或易碎的物品吗？

definition: rare/uncommon/rarity/to value as a rarity/to cherish/Taiwan pr. [xi1 han3]
to give away/to accompany/to see sb off
Don't get a reward if it's not deserved. (idiom)
